text:
Hi Yaw,
Sorry for the delay in my reply, I have been very busy working on some new projects the last weeks.
That’s wonderful news that you got a runner position at Dneg, congratulations!
It’s a perfect way to get into the VFX industry and learn a lot of tips and tricks form colleagues in a big VFX production house.
Dneg have really good learning resources, check out their web training resources. (But I’m sure they have already showed you this). It’s also a great opportunity to learn thing for colleagues you work with and to get some new pieces for your showreel. They usually invite guest speakers once a week and I can recommend to go and listen to them if you have the opportunity.

And don’t forget to enjoy the monthly beer and pizza Fridays! :wink:

Good luck and let me know if you have any questions or things you wonder about and I  will try to answer as best as I can.
